title: "We have restored this installation to an older version of League of Legends."
body:
This message keeps appearing when trying to log in, had a match starting --> "Attempting to reconnect" --> Restarting the client --> Message above.
Now I can't log in with my account because apparently those I enter are the "wrong username or password", even if I just changed it.

replies.body: Aye I know how to fix this go to your league folder go to rads click on projects and delete League Client folder then go run the league client and it will repair the folder and then u wont get the error I just tried and it worked for me
Just leave the client on for a few minutes and it should patch itself up :)

I've noticed a few players have been able to get around this weird login issue by grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and running a *Force Repatch*. If that doesn't help, let's also try switching your region to see if that forces the repatch. Once it's patched, switch back to your normal region and give it a try!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=0kNuqfw6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-22T23:21:55.856+0000)
>
> I've noticed a few players have been able to get around this weird login issue by grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and running a *Force Repatch*. If that doesn't help, let's also try switching your region to see if that forces the repatch. Once it's patched, switch back to your normal region and give it a try!

It doesn't patch. Changing the region prompts the Terms of Agreement pop up but nothing happens once you click accept.

Hey bro, i jsut had this probleme, what i did to fix it, go to settings in league client where you're supposed to log in .... and then click ''initiate full repair '' and wait like 5 mins for the repair.. and theere you go!
Yea I am having the same issue and I tried Repair. Didn't work.
